short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can define your own prompts for GPT and use them in the browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The "GPT Prompts" Chrome extension is your all-in-one content companion, designed to simplify your online experience, boost your creativity, and enhance your productivity. Whether you're a writer, researcher, or just a curious learner, this powerful tool is here to help you unlock the full potential of the web.

Key Features:

Instant Summarization:

With a single click, effortlessly condense lengthy articles and web content into concise and digestible summaries.
Save time by quickly extracting the most important information.
Effortless Explanations:

Highlight any text on a web page, and "GPT Prompts" provides clear and easy-to-understand explanations.
No more struggling to grasp complex concepts or jargon.
Creative Content Generation:

Stuck in a creative rut? Generate prompts and text variations to spark your imagination.
Perfect for writers, bloggers, and content creators looking to expand their horizons.
Enhanced Research:

Seamlessly gather information from multiple sources while researching online.
Transform articles into insightful snippets and organize your findings effortlessly.
Tailored to Your Needs:

Customize the extension to suit your preferences, whether it's fine-tuning summarization length or adjusting explanation styles.
Make "GPT Prompts" work the way you want it to.
Why Choose GPT Prompts:

Efficiency: Save time by quickly summarizing and understanding content.
Creativity: Overcome writer's block with creative prompts and text variations.
Productivity: Streamline your research process and stay organized.
Customization: Tailor the extension to your specific needs and workflow.
Unlock the power of GPT-3 with "GPT Prompts" and revolutionize the way you consume, understand, and create content online. Whether you're a student, professional, or content enthusiast, this extension is your indispensable companion for a smarter and more creative web experience.

Install "GPT Prompts" now and take your online journey to the next level!
